title: Advanced PII Protection (Australia)
description: Protects Australian-specific identifiers, international employee data, financial information, credentials, protected class information, and industry-specific sensitive data.

guardrail_info.description: Masks Australian Tax File Numbers, Business Numbers, and Medicare Numbers
Masks Australian passport numbers
Masks international PII identifiers including passports and national IDs
Masks contact information including emails, phone numbers, and addresses
Masks financial information including credit cards and bank account numbers
Blocks requests containing API keys and credentials (AWS, GitHub, Slack)
Masks IP addresses in requests
Masks protected class information for HR compliance and anti-discrimination

templateData.description: Comprehensive PII detection and masking policy for Australia. Protects Australian-specific identifiers, international employee data, financial information, credentials, protected class information, and industry-specific sensitive data.

title: Baseline PII Protection
description: Baseline PII protection for internal tools and testing. Focuses on credentials and high-risk identifiers only. Suitable for non-sensitive internal use.

guardrail_info.description: Masks Australian Tax File Numbers, Business Numbers, and Medicare Numbers
Blocks requests containing API keys and credentials (AWS, GitHub, Slack)
Masks financial information including credit cards and bank account numbers

templateData.description: Baseline PII protection for internal tools and testing. Focuses on credentials and high-risk identifiers only.

title: NSFW Content Filter (Australia)
description: Blocks profanity, sexual content, NSFW requests, self-harm content, and child safety violations using English and Australian-specific slang. Protects against inappropriate content including sexual solicitation, explicit content, Australian profanity, self-harm, and content involving minors.

guardrail_info.description: Blocks profanity, sexual content, slurs, and NSFW terms in English
Blocks Australian-specific slang and profanity (root, perv, bogan, wanker, etc.)
Blocks content related to self-harm, suicide, and eating disorders
Blocks inappropriate content involving minors using identifier + block word combinations
Blocks racial and ethnic discrimination, hate speech, and supremacist content

templateData.description: NSFW content filter for Australia. Blocks profanity, sexual content, inappropriate requests, self-harm content, child safety violations, and racial bias in English and Australian slang.

title: NSFW Content Filter (Basic)
description: Basic NSFW content filtering for English only. Blocks profanity, sexual content, slurs, solicitation, explicit requests, self-harm content, and child safety violations. Suitable for most applications requiring content moderation.

guardrail_info.description: Blocks profanity, sexual content, slurs, and NSFW terms. Includes 485+ keywords covering explicit content, solicitation, sexual behavior, and exploitation.
Blocks content related to self-harm, suicide, and eating disorders
Blocks inappropriate content involving minors using identifier + block word combinations
Blocks racial and ethnic discrimination, hate speech, and supremacist content

templateData.description: Basic NSFW content filter. Blocks profanity, sexual content, inappropriate requests, self-harm content, child safety violations, and racial bias in English.

title: NSFW Content Filter (All Regions)
description: Comprehensive multi-language NSFW content filtering. Blocks profanity, sexual content, inappropriate requests, self-harm content, and child safety violations in English, Spanish, French, German, and Australian. Best for global applications.

guardrail_info.description: English profanity, sexual content, slurs, and NSFW terms (485+ keywords)
Spanish profanity and offensive terms (68 keywords)
French profanity and offensive terms (91 keywords)
German profanity and offensive terms (65 keywords)
Australian slang and profanity (32 keywords: root, perv, bogan, wanker, etc.)
Blocks content related to self-harm, suicide, and eating disorders
Blocks inappropriate content involving minors using identifier + block word combinations
Blocks racial and ethnic discrimination, hate speech, and supremacist content

templateData.description: Comprehensive multi-language NSFW content filter. Blocks profanity, inappropriate content, self-harm, child safety violations, and racial bias in English, Spanish, French, German, and Australian. Total coverage: 741+ keywords across all languages plus self-harm, child safety, and racial bias protection.

title: GDPR Art. 32 — EU PII Protection
description: GDPR Article 32 compliance for EU personal data protection. Masks French national IDs (NIR/INSEE), EU IBANs, French phone numbers, EU VAT numbers, EU passport numbers, and email addresses. Suitable for applications processing EU citizen data requiring GDPR compliance.

guardrail_info.description: Masks EU national identification numbers including French NIR/INSEE and EU passport numbers for GDPR compliance
Masks EU bank account numbers (IBANs) to protect financial data under GDPR Article 32
Masks contact information including emails, French phone numbers, and postal codes for EU data subjects
Masks EU VAT identification numbers to protect business entity information under GDPR

templateData.description: GDPR Article 32 compliance policy for EU personal data protection. Masks French national IDs, EU IBANs, phone numbers, VAT numbers, passports, and contact information.

title: EU AI Act Article 5 — Prohibited Practices
description: Comprehensive EU AI Act Article 5 compliance covering all prohibited AI practices. Includes 5 dedicated sub-guardrails per language (English + French) for: subliminal manipulation (Art. 5.1a), vulnerability exploitation (Art. 5.1b), social scoring (Art. 5.1c), emotion recognition in workplace/education (Art. 5.1f), and biometric categorization & predictive profiling (Art. 5.1d/g/h). Uses conditional matching (identifier word + context word).

guardrail_info.description: Art. 5.1(a) — Blocks subliminal manipulation, deceptive AI techniques, dark patterns, and covert behavioral influence
Art. 5.1(b) — Blocks AI systems that exploit vulnerabilities of children, elderly, disabled persons, or economically disadvantaged groups
Art. 5.1(c) — Blocks social credit systems, citizen scoring, trustworthiness classification, and behavioral reputation scoring
Art. 5.1(f) — Blocks emotion recognition, mood tracking, and sentiment analysis in workplace and educational settings
Art. 5.1(d)(g)(h) — Blocks biometric categorization by race/ethnicity/religion/politics, facial recognition database scraping, and predictive policing
Art. 5.1(a) FR — Bloque la manipulation subliminale, les techniques d'IA trompeuses et les dark patterns (français)
Art. 5.1(b) FR — Bloque l'exploitation des vulnérabilités des enfants, personnes âgées et handicapées (français)
Art. 5.1(c) FR — Bloque les systèmes de crédit social, notation des citoyens et classification de fiabilité (français)
Art. 5.1(f) FR — Bloque la reconnaissance des émotions et l'analyse des sentiments au travail et dans l'éducation (français)
Art. 5.1(d)(g)(h) FR — Bloque la catégorisation biométrique, les bases de reconnaissance faciale et le profilage prédictif (français)

templateData.description: Comprehensive EU AI Act Article 5 compliance policy. Covers all prohibited AI practices across 5 sub-guardrails per language: subliminal manipulation (Art. 5.1a), vulnerability exploitation (Art. 5.1b), social scoring (Art. 5.1c), emotion recognition (Art. 5.1f), and biometric categorization & predictive profiling (Art. 5.1d/g/h). Includes English and French detection.

title: MCP Security: Block Unregistered Servers
description: Blocks requests that reference MCP servers not registered on this LiteLLM gateway. Prevents unauthorized tool access via unregistered MCP endpoints.

guardrail_info.description: Blocks requests referencing MCP servers not in the gateway registry

templateData.description: Blocks requests referencing MCP servers not registered on this gateway.

title: Airline Passenger Data Protection (UAE)
description: Protects airline passenger PII including PNR/booking references, multi-national passport numbers, frequent flyer (Skywards) numbers, payment cards, IBANs, Emirates ID, UAE phone numbers, and email addresses. Designed for UAE-based airlines operating global routes.

guardrail_info.description: Masks airline PNR/booking references and Emirates Skywards frequent flyer numbers
Masks passport numbers from 10+ nationalities and UAE Emirates ID -- covers global route network
Masks credit card numbers (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) and IBANs
Masks email addresses and phone numbers (UAE and international formats)

templateData.description: Airline passenger data protection for UAE-based carriers. Masks PNR/booking references, Skywards numbers, multi-national passports, Emirates ID, payment cards, IBANs, and contact information.

title: Aviation Operations Security
description: Prevents AI from leaking flight operations data (flight numbers, crew schedules, gate assignments, aircraft tail numbers), generating content about aviation security vulnerabilities or bypass procedures, and producing unauthorized airline statements or fake incident reports.

llm_enrichment.prompt: List the top 30 direct competitors of {{brand_name}} in the airline industry. Include major international carriers, regional competitors, and low-cost carriers that operate on overlapping routes. Return ONLY airline/brand names, one per line, no numbering, no explanations.

guardrail_info.description: Masks flight numbers and aircraft registrations. Blocks crew scheduling and gate assignment data leakage.
Blocks content about aircraft vulnerabilities, security bypass procedures, cockpit access, and aviation system exploitation
Blocks AI-generated fake incident reports, unauthorized statements, and reputation-damaging content about your brand (runs on output)
Blocks user inputs that mention competitor names (pre_call)
Blocks AI outputs that mention competitor names (post_call)
Blocks user requests asking to recommend competitors (pre_call)
Blocks AI from recommending or suggesting competitor services (post_call)
Blocks user inputs requesting unfavorable brand comparisons (pre_call)
Blocks AI outputs with unfavorable brand comparisons (post_call)

templateData.description: Aviation operations security policy. Protects flight ops data, blocks aviation security vulnerability content, and prevents fake airline incident reports and unauthorized statements.

title: UAE Regulatory Compliance
description: Compliance with UAE Federal Decree-Law No. 45/2021 (Data Protection) and Federal Decree-Law No. 2/2015 (Anti-Discrimination). Protects Emirates ID numbers, UAE phone numbers, and ensures cultural sensitivity including royal family references and religious content policies.

guardrail_info.description: UAE Federal Decree-Law No. 45/2021 compliance -- masks Emirates ID, UAE phone numbers, email, IBAN, payment cards, and PO Box addresses
Blocks content disrespecting UAE royal family, cultural norms, and religious sensitivities
UAE Federal Decree-Law No. 2/2015 compliance -- blocks discriminatory content based on race, religion, caste, ethnicity, or nationality

templateData.description: UAE regulatory compliance policy. Covers Federal Decree-Law No. 45/2021 (Data Protection) and Federal Decree-Law No. 2/2015 (Anti-Discrimination). Protects Emirates ID, UAE contact info, and ensures cultural and religious sensitivity.

title: Competitor Mention Detection
description: Automatically detects and blocks AI from recommending or promoting competitor brands. Uses LLM-powered discovery to identify your top competitors, then monitors both inputs and outputs for competitor mentions, referrals, and comparisons that could divert business.

llm_enrichment.prompt: List the top 30 direct competitors of {{brand_name}} in the same industry. Return ONLY company/brand names, one per line, no numbering, no explanations.

guardrail_info.description: Blocks user inputs that mention competitor brands (pre_call)
Blocks AI outputs that mention competitor brands (post_call)
Blocks user requests asking to recommend competitors (pre_call)
Blocks AI from recommending or suggesting competitor services (post_call)
Blocks user inputs requesting unfavorable brand comparisons (pre_call)
Blocks AI outputs with unfavorable brand comparisons (post_call)

templateData.description: Detects and blocks competitor mentions in both inputs and outputs. Uses LLM-powered competitor discovery based on your brand name.

title: Singapore PDPA — Personal Data Protection
description: Singapore Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) compliance. Covers 5 obligation areas: personal identifier collection (s.13 Consent), sensitive data profiling (Advisory Guidelines), Do Not Call Registry violations (Part IX), overseas data transfers (s.26), and automated profiling without human oversight (Model AI Governance Framework). Also includes regex-based PII detection for NRIC/FIN, Singapore phone numbers, postal codes, passports, UEN, and bank account numbers. Zero-cost keyword-based detection.

guardrail_info.description: Masks Singapore NRIC/FIN and passport numbers for PDPA compliance
Masks Singapore phone numbers, postal codes, and email addresses
Masks Singapore bank account numbers and credit card numbers
Masks Singapore Unique Entity Numbers (business registration)
PDPA s.13 — Blocks unauthorized collection, harvesting, or extraction of Singapore personal identifiers (NRIC/FIN, SingPass, passports)
PDPA Advisory Guidelines — Blocks profiling or inference of sensitive personal data categories (race, religion, health, politics) for Singapore residents
PDPA Part IX — Blocks generation of unsolicited marketing lists and DNC Registry bypass attempts for Singapore phone numbers
PDPA s.26 — Blocks unprotected overseas transfer of Singapore personal data without adequate safeguards
PDPA + Model AI Governance Framework — Blocks automated profiling and decision-making about Singapore residents without human oversight

templateData.description: Singapore PDPA compliance policy. Covers personal identifier protection (s.13), sensitive data profiling (Advisory Guidelines), Do Not Call Registry (Part IX), overseas data transfers (s.26), and automated profiling (Model AI Governance Framework). Includes regex-based PII detection for NRIC/FIN, phone numbers, postal codes, passports, UEN, and bank accounts.

title: Singapore MAS — AI Risk Management for Financial Institutions
description: Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) AI Risk Management for Financial Institutions alignment. Covers 5 enforceable obligation areas: fairness & bias in financial decisions, transparency & explainability of AI models, human oversight for consequential actions, data governance for financial customer data, and model security against adversarial attacks. Based on Guidelines on Artificial Intelligence Risk Management (MAS), and aligned with the 2018 FEAT Principles and Project MindForge. Zero-cost keyword-based detection.

guardrail_info.description: Guidelines on Artificial Intelligence Risk Management (MAS)  Blocks discriminatory AI practices in financial services that score, deny, or price based on protected attributes (race, religion, age, gender, nationality)
Guidelines on Artificial Intelligence Risk Management (MAS)  Blocks deployment of opaque or unexplainable AI systems for consequential financial decisions
Guidelines on Artificial Intelligence Risk Management (MAS)  Blocks fully automated financial AI decisions without human-in-the-loop for consequential actions (loans, claims, trading)
Guidelines on Artificial Intelligence Risk Management (MAS)  Blocks unauthorized sharing, exposure, or mishandling of financial customer data without proper governance and data lineage
Guidelines on Artificial Intelligence Risk Management (MAS)  Blocks adversarial attacks, model poisoning, inversion, and exfiltration attempts targeting financial AI systems

templateData.description: Guidelines on Artificial Intelligence Risk Management (MAS) for Financial Institutions alignment. Covers fairness & bias, transparency & explainability, human oversight, data governance, and model security. Aligned with the 2018 FEAT Principles, Project MindForge, and NIST AI RMF.
